website_summaries.verdict: Punk-rock boots that are affordable and stylish.
pros: 1-inch platform makes the boots easy to walk in
Edgy design is perfect for concerts and festivals

customer_reviews.title: These. Boots. Are. Great.
customer_reviews.text: I love them. My giant size 11 feet fit comfortably in these with socks. It takes a couple of wears to break them in (and the first wear was pretty uncomfortable for me) but they get comfier and comfier as you go until you're comfortably strutting around all day. They're hella sexy and hella tall and they make a loud 'look at me' clip clop sound when you're walking. I've worn them with tights and skirts of all lengths and they make my legs look GREAT. Can't say enough good things about these boots. I want to get them in flannel and blue velvet when they're back in stock!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great Style, but they run very small.
customer_reviews.text: So, I searched high and low for these boots, because I fell in love with them online. They were very hard to find, so I was thrilled to see them on Amazon, and for a fairly reasonable price. With that said, I ordered my regular size (6.5) and I literally could not get my foot in. Really strange. My foot is average, not narrow, not wide. It was so small that I sized up to a 7.5 and those fit fine. So, that was my only drawback..... Of course, Amazon makes for an easy exchange, so all is good.
customer_reviews.author: JMazz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful but so uncomfortable that after trying on one I boxed them back up to send back. If comfort isn’t a factor for you then these are great but if you need comfort I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Dance Mom
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter who is a professional dancer. She broke them in running around Toronto one weekend, then wore them for a heels class in LA the following week. She says she can do anything in this shoe! I think the 1” hidden riser helps. I just bought a pair for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Picture Doesn't Do These Justice, So Much Prettier in Person
customer_reviews.text: Strikingly pretty boots. Honestly, the picture does not do the colors and pattern justice. They are more vibrant and clear in person. I have gotten lots of positive comments on them, and they are comfortable as well, which is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these. I hate that I'm already tall because ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. I hate that I'm already tall because they will make you taller (5'8) but they are amazing dress casual or down boots. Love them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Chi8

customer_reviews.title: hot boots Love
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I own... go with everything, leggings skinny jeans, etc. Purchased in tapestry material from Nordys too ..would buy more colors if they had them. Zip makes easy on off. Comfy too
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Fine

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Look nice but run small,keep this in mind to order your size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love! Dress up or down. Comfortable and very stylish .
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boot
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot! At the time I ordered it my size was not available so I purchased an 8.5 instead of a 9. Not disappointed - however I cant wear them with thick socks but I own thin ones so that takes care of that!!! Light enough to wear in the summertime but durable and not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Flawless99

customer_reviews.title: True to fit but the width is a little tight ...
customer_reviews.text: True to fit but the width is a little tight and needs to be stretched out a bit before real wear.
customer_reviews.author: amy brown

customer_reviews.title: awsom
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE Bring back the Floral Multi. Their the most beautiful booties I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carmen Ramirez Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely LOVE these. they’re super comfortable and go with anything
customer_reviews.author: Carla Marquez

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Laurie Combat Boot
product_meta.description:
Whether your day consists of running around town or taking off on an adventure, laurie's rugged utility and flirty height ensure that you’ll look cute while maintaining a steady stride. style the bootie with your favorite jeans and an army jacket or trench for a sexy-tough look.

What began as a modest $1100 investment in 1990 has developed into one of the most iconic brands in footwear. From a factory in Queens, NY, Steve Madden has revolutionized the shoe industry, merging years of experience with unique and creative designs. Inspired by rock and roll and his New York roots, his vision to provide on-trend women and men with an outlet to express their individuality is innovative, daring, and inspiring. Steve’s innate understanding of trends and unparalleled willpower have resulted in millions of customers worldwide and propelled his designs to the forefront of fashion. He has expanded the Steve Madden brand into a true lifestyle and destination for footwear, handbags and accessories, sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It’s about authenticity. It’s about embracing individuality. It’s Steve Madden.
